entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
